casebody.data:
Investors Mortgage Company, Inc. v. Herbert Smith et al. (12252)

Foti, Landau and Cretella, Js.

Argued September 22 decision released October 12, 1993 *905Herbert Smith, pro se, with whom, on the brief, was Lois Smith, pro se, the appellants (named defendant et al.). Ronald D. Japha, with whom, on the brief, were Abraham I. Gordon and Richard S. Scalo, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
